articles.author: Ben Morse
articles.title: NBA Finals: What to know as OKC Thunder and Indiana Pacers battle for title - CNN
articles.description: What do you need to know as the NBA Finals tip off with the Oklahoma City Thunder and Indiana Pacers facing off for the Larry O’Brien Trophy? CNN Sports is here to fill you in on everything.
articles.content:
The 2025 NBA playoffs have been ones to remember with shock results, historical big comebacks and the traditional heavyweights struggling.
And at the end of a thrilling postseason, it is two teams w… [+6555 chars]
